projects.name: iSamples
projects.description: The Internet of Samples (iSamples) is a multi-disciplinary and multi-institutional project funded by the National Science Foundation. Deployed React, redux, Cesium to achieve large scale data search and 3D visualization.

projects.name: 50 Small Project in React
projects.description: This personal project implements 50 small projects to achieve some front-end features by React, Typescript, Sass.

projects.name: Movie App
projects.description: Search the latest movie information and add favorite movie to the wish list by react, redux-toolkit, and Sass.

projects.name: Online Dashboard
projects.description: Online Dashboard for users to view their information. Used Redux to manage both data-state and UI-state in the web application for easier tracing changes caused by actions respectively.

projects.name: Flexible Spending Accounts
projects.description: Developed the user interface using Javascript(ES6), SASS, ReactJS, Redux, and ReactRouter. allows users to allocate both existing and new account credit towards future events, experiences, and merchandise.
